title: 'X-Men' Dominate Weekend Box Office
teaser: Memorial Day weekend is traditionally the beginning of the summer blockbuster season, and "X-Men: Days of Future Past" dominated.
contentencoded:
Memorial Day weekend is traditionally the beginning of the summer blockbuster season.

And this weekend “X-Men: Days of Future Past” dominated at the box office, bringing in about $91 million opening weekend in the U.S., and about $260 million dollars worldwide.
